2.0 ) \nIn the documentation it states that you can fetch binary doc_values by using \"doc_values\": true, for that type: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/binary.html.\nWhen trying to fetch this in a java plugin I always get unsupported_operation_exception, thrown by UnsupportedOperationException, BytesBinaryDVAtomicFieldData line 104:\nyou can reproduce it by creating a simple index and adding some documents with binary data\n\n``` bash\ncurl -s -XPUT \"http://localhost:9200/testindex/\" -d '{\n    \"settings\": {\n        \"index.number_of_shards\": 1,\n        \"index.number_of_replicas\": 0\n    },\n    \"mappings\": {\n    \"test\":{\"_all\":{\"enabled\":false},\n    \"properties\":{\n        \"qa_data\":{\"type\":\"binary\", \"doc_values\": true}\n        }\n       }\n    }\n}'\n\ncurl -s -XPUT 'http://localhost:9200/testindex/test/3'  -d '{\n            \"qa_data\" : \"\"\n}'\ncurl -s -XPUT 'http://localhost:9200/testindex/test/4'  -d '{\n             \"qa_data\" : \"\"\n```\n\nWriting a simple plugin that just calls doc() or calls doc().get('qa_data') will throw exceptions immediately. \n\n``` java\n  @Override\n    public float runAsFloat() {\n        float finalScore = 0;\n        LeafDocLookup doc = doc(); //=> will throw java.lang.UnupportedOperationException \n    }\n```\n","closed_by":{"login":"nik9000","id":215970,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjIxNTk3MA==","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/215970?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000","html_url":"https://github.com/nik9000","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/nik9000/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"performed_via_github_app":null}
